summary: Config::load_from_base_config_with_overrides now threads the wrap_break_long_words override from CLI flags/profiles and defaults to true so TUI + markdown renderers share the same wrapping policy.

The inline /logs command accepts optional stream selectors (stdout/stderr/both), show/hide/toggle verbs, and explicit call ids, then emits AppEvent::ToggleExecStream events so users can expand or collapse shell output inline.

App::handle_exec_stream_toggle locates the requested exec call (falling back to the latest), validates stdout/stderr buffers, flips the collapsed flag, repaints transcript/overlays, and posts status toasts so /logs actions feel immediate.

ExecCell stream sections display per-stream line counts, pluralize captions correctly via pluralize_line_word, cap wrapped previews, and append `/logs <stream> <verb>` hints so users discover the inline toggles.
Advanced guide documents the wrap_break_long_words toggle and shows how to flip it via config overrides so transcripts/composer share the same word-wrapping semantics.
ToolEmitter::unified_exec теперь пересылает токенизированные команды, поэтому parse_command снова распознаёт Search/List/Read и TUI не показывает сырые "bash -lc ..." строки.
SessionManager/BackgroundShellи теперь сохраняют Vec<String> команд и переиспользуют их в ToolEmitter, чтобы ExecCommandBegin/End воссоздавали детерминированную историю действий.
